text.div:
SriLanka

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://openhie.org/fhir/sri-lanka/ImplementationGuide/openhie.fhir.sri-lanka

A FHIR Implementation Guide - Sri Lanka

name: SriLanka
title: HL7 FHIR Implementation Guide: Sri Lanka
description: A FHIR Implementation Guide - Sri Lanka

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance
resource.description: IPS Allergy intolerance codes value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 373873005 |Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product)|; all descendants of 105590001 |Substance (substance)|; all descendants of 418038007 |Propensity to adverse reactions to substance (finding)| plus codes for absent and unknown allergies.

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance
resource.description: Example where a code is used to represent an allergy

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance
resource.description: Example where only a text value is used to represent an allergy

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance - SNOMED CT Free Set
resource.description: This value set includes the codes for allergy or intolerance findings from the SNOMED International Patient Set (IPS) subset of SNOMED CT (IPS Free Set) that are included in: all descendants of 373873005 |Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product)|; all descendants of 105590001 |Substance (substance)|; all descendants of 418038007 |Propensity to adverse reactions to substance (finding)|.

resource.name: Blood Pressure Observation
resource.description: Represents the Systolic and Diastolic blood pressure for the patient.

resource.name: Cardiovascular Risk Category Probability Percentage Ranges
resource.description: Cardiovascular Risk Category Probability Percentage Ranges

resource.name: Cardiovascular Risk Category Probability Percentage Ranges
resource.description: Cardiovascular Risk Category Probability Percentage Ranges

resource.name: Conditions
resource.description: Represents previous, pre-existing and new conditions.

resource.name: Conditions
resource.description: Represents previous, pre-existing and new conditions.

resource.name: Extension For Patient Idenitifiers Needing Multiple Values
resource.description: This extension can be used by those patient identifiers where multiple values need to be associated with a single identifier slice.

resource.name: Generic Task
resource.description: Is primarily used to track the progress of a patient's service request such as referrals and lab orders etc.

resource.name: Generic Task
resource.description: Is primarily used to track the progress of a patient's service request such as referrals and lab orders etc.

resource.name: HHIMS Patient
resource.description: Is used to document demographics and other administrative information about an HHIMS individual receiving care or other health-related services.

resource.name: HHIMS PatientExample
resource.description: Is used to document demographics and other administrative information about an HHIMS individual receiving care or other health-related services.

resource.name: HHIMS Referral Task
resource.description: Indicates the outcome of a patient's referral.

resource.name: HIMS Composition
resource.description: Logically groups all resources into a single document structure.

resource.name: HIMS Composition
resource.description: Logically groups all resources into a single document structure.

resource.name: HIMS Patient
resource.description:
Is used to document demographics and other administrative information about an individual receiving care or other health-related services. 
    In addition to the profiled data elements, this profile includes all data elements from the HHIMS Patient profile.

resource.name: HIMS Patient
resource.description: Is used to document demographics and other administrative information about an individual receiving care or other health-related services. In addition to the profiled data elements, this profile includes all data elements from the HHIMS Patient profile.

resource.name: Hypertension
resource.description: Patient is diagnosed with Hypertension due to high blood pressure.

resource.name: Hypertension
resource.description: Patient is diagnosed with Hypertension due to high blood pressure.

resource.name: Injections
resource.description: Example where a code is used to represent the route of drug admninistration

resource.name: Injections
resource.description: Example where only a text value is used to represent the route of drug admninistration

resource.name: Investigations Task
resource.description: Is primarily used to track the progress of an investigations request.

resource.name: Investigations Task
resource.description: Is primarily used to track the progress of an investigations request.

resource.name: Medical History
resource.description: Represents previous, pre-existing and new conditions.

resource.name: Medical History
resource.description: Represents previous, pre-existing and new conditions.

resource.name: Physical Activity Status Observation
resource.description: Represents the physical status of the patient.

resource.name: Physical Activity Status Observation
resource.description: Represents the physical status of the patient.

resource.name: Practitioner
resource.description: Represents the practitioners who participated in the observation.

resource.name: Practitioner
resource.description: Represents the practitioners who participated in the observation.

resource.name: Prescription Request
resource.description: This is to record a patient's medication prescription request

resource.name: Prescription Request
resource.description: This is to record a patient's medication prescription request

resource.name: Referral Task
resource.description: Is primarily used to track the progress of a patient's referral.

resource.name: Target Facility Encounter
resource.description: Represents the current facility at which the patient is receiving health services.

resource.name: Target Facility Encounter
resource.description: Represents the current facility at which the patient is receiving health services.

resource.name: Tobacco Smoker Observation
resource.description: Represents the tobacco smoking status of the patient.

resource.name: Tobacco Smoker Observation
resource.description: Represents the tobacco smoking status of the patient.

resource.name: Total Cholesterol
resource.description: Represents the patient's total cholesterol results.

resource.name: Total Cholesterol
resource.description: Represents the patient's total cholesterol results.

resource.name: WHO ATC
resource.description: World Health Organization Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system. Note: The currently implemented code system and the value set expansion contain only a set of example ATC codes, not the complete code system content.
